s.text: The dailies compare Floyd to Hugo (1989, 29 killed, $5.9 billion damage, says the LAT ) and Andrew (1992, 26 killed, $25 billion damage, says the LAT ).
The dailies compare Floyd to Hugo (1989, 29 killed, $5.9 billion damage, says the LAT ) and Andrew (1992, 26 killed, $25 billion damage, says the LAT ).
The city councilman for the area involved has called for a full public debate about whether or not the LAFD is in fact writing off certain homes in case of fire.

The Wall Street Journal "Tax Report" depends a little too much on IRS Commissioner Charles Rossotti, judging from how frequently the good commissioner appears in the column being a ... well, good commissioner.
